NK040(thi)054:1: // zab mo gcod kyi tshogs mchod bsdus pa dngos grub kyi sa bon bzhugs /
NK040(thi)054:2: rlung me thod sgyed la gnas ka p+aa lar //
NK040(thi)054:3: tshogs kyi yo byad dam rdzas kun tshang zhing //
NK040(thi)054:4: rang rig mkha' 'gro rang lus de dang 'dres //
NK040(thi)054:5: phata phata phata phatah sha rus khrag gis phyur bur gtams pa la /
NK040(thi)054:6: ram yam kham spros ma dag ngos 'dzin sbyangs //
NK040(thi)054:7: rdzas zhu rlangs pa zla phyed rdo rje yis //
NK040(thi)054:8: rwa la rigs lnga'i snying po bcud gsal ba'i //
NK040(thi)054:9: 'od zer gyis bskul 'khor 'das bdud rtsi bkug /
NK040(thi)054:10: yas rim gyis zhu thod pa'i bdud rtsir 'dres //
NK040(thi)054:12: gnas rang bzhin rnam dag pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)054:13: khyed skyabs gnas mchog dang snying rje'i mgron //
NK040(thi)054:15: tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)054:16: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)054:17: byin rlabs thugs rje rgyun ma chad //
NK040(thi)054:18: phyi nang gnyis kyi bar chad sol //
NK040(thi)054:19: ma h+aa su kha sa ma ya ho /
NK040(thi)054:20: g+ha na tsa kra pu tsa kha kha kh+aa hi /
NK040(thi)054:22: zhal zas tshogs gtor 'di bsngosa pas //
NK040(thi)054:23: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)054:24: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub gyur cig /
NK040(thi)054:26: h'u h+r+aih rdo rje khros ma'i bka' nyan las byed tshogs //
NK040(thi)054:27: bka' yi pha 'bab lhag gtor 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)054:28: zhi rgyas dbang drag 'gugs 'dren mnan gzir sogs //
NK040(thi)054:29: ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)054:30: ces pa'ang bka' ma'i dgongs pa bsdus nas snying sdug
NK040(thi)054:31: gi bu rat+nasa bskul ngor bi dza'i ming gis bris
NK040(thi)054:32: pa mchog thun gyi dngos grub bde blag tu 'grub
